articles.author: Lex Harvey
articles.title: Australia refuses to repatriate ISIS-linked citizens in Syria as escape attempt fails - CNN
articles.description: Australia will not repatriate its citizens with links to Islamic State members, Prime Minister Anthony Albanese told the national broadcaster on Tuesday, with a blunt message for families stranded in Syria: “If you make your bed, you lie in it.”
articles.content: Australia will not repatriate its citizens with links to Islamic State members, Prime Minister Anthony Albanese told the national broadcaster Tuesday, with blunt advice to families stranded in Syria:… [+4516 chars]
